about_the_game:
A mystery visual novel in theme of reincarnation and science-fiction. Opposite to other game, you are not the hero takes item bag, you are the bag yourself! You forge, dissolve, combine, throw, absorb items to change the fate of heros.

Each character line presents different theme, emotional style, and gameplay. They construct a large deep truth.

Game Feature:

  • Story mode contains 12 character lines, 200 endings and 30+ hours main story.
  • The player-bag can forge, dissolve, combine, throw, absorb items. There are many suprising tricks.
  • Abyss mode contains 50 roles to choose, 50*51 stages, contains endless roguelike mode.
  • Contains PVP mode.

Recommand to player:

  • Who like mystery adventure games which narrate in multiple view. If you are fan of "Zero Escape" or "Unheard", you will like this game.
  • Who like manga like theme of reincarnation into a new world. The world setting will give you more pleasure.
  • If you are player like idle game or strategy game, you will find the Abyss Mode very interesting and exciting.

Not recommand to player:

  • Player has high standard to graphics and audios, this game is not good enough in these dimension.
  • Player need short feedback. The story mode of the game need some patience.

DON'T buy the game if it not suitable for you.
If you are not sure if the game is suitable for you or not, you can download the demo of the game, try some hours.

name: I,bag

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible videocard
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: desktop resolution no less than 1920*1080

short_description: A mystery visual novel in theme of reincarnation and science-fiction. Opposite to other game, you are not the hero takes item bag, you are the bag yourself! You forge, dissolve, combine, throw, absorb items to change the fate of heros. Has 200 endings and 30+ hours main story.
